item.title: CS39-lecture-notes
item.description: CS 39 Lecture notes # Aug 21, 2018 # Using ARM assembly language RISC - reduced instructions set computer ARM is a British company that designs intellectual property, now owned by a japanese company (Softbank). Last year there was 14 billion ARM chips produced Software you need: Keil ARM MDK - software development kit for M-series microcontrollers www.keil.com (Windows only) [X] Download Keil tool [2018-08-23] Aug 23, 2018 # A diagram of almost everything
